snippet: The label and Internet phenomenon PC Music and the D.J. and producer Sophie shared an event featuring several artists as part of the Red Bull Music Academy Festival.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews multi-artist pop music concert featuring acts from PC Music recording label, part of Red Bull Music Academy Festival, at BRIC House in Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: The label and Internet phenomenon PC Music and the D.J. and producer Sophie shared an event featuring several artists as part of the Red Bull Music Academy Festival.

headline.main: Review: PC Music and Sophie in a High-Concept Extravaganza at BRIC House
headline.print_headline: Something to Love, Mock and Shape
